theShowman:ThirdTimeCharm.NAME: 3rd Time Charm
theShowman:ThirdTimeCharm.FLAVOR: 33% of the time, it works, every time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b3rd card you play draws an additional card and #yExhausts itself.

theShowman:TrigonOfTrickery.NAME: Trigon Of Trickery
theShowman:TrigonOfTrickery.FLAVOR: Tricks to trick even the trickiest of tricksters.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #y3rd #yTime #yCharm [REMOVE_SPACE]. Every #b3rd card you play #yExhausts itself. Whenever you #yExhaust a card, draw a card.

theShowman:Millstone.NAME: Millstone
DESCRIPTIONS: #ytheshowman:Stacked reduces a card's effect by #b2 less.

theShowman:ImprovRelic.NAME: Improv for Dummies Vol2
theShowman:ImprovRelic.FLAVOR: The entire book is improvised by its author.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b2 cards you draw each combat #ytheshowman:Improvise [REMOVE_SPACE].

theShowman:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.
